summary:
mr. drs. J.H.J. (Jeroen) Hanekamp (LLM, MSc) is the CEO of CLEVR. Previously, he was Vice President at Dassault Systèmes and the CEO of DELMIA Quintiq. Earlier, he held the roles of Chief Commercial Operations Officer and General Counsel. Hanekamp earned degrees in Strategic Organization Management (BSc) and Commercial Law (LLB), a master's degree in Business Administration (judicium cum laude), and a master's degree in Corporate Law (LLM).

Hanekamp was founder of Ficsus.nl (2009) and has been co-responsible for the business start-up of the First Dutch Innovations company TNO Triskelion (2011). Ficsus.nl was sold in 2019 to e-Boekhouden.nl.

More fun and interests: Beach volleyball, running, 2 daughters and 2 sons. Furthermore, Hanekamp has been appointed Medical Duty Officer (“Officier van Dienst Geneeskundig”) for Veiligheidsregio Utrecht and regularly combines 7x24hr on-call shifts with his daily work in IT.

Specialties: Strategic and operational management, business development, entrepreneurship, contract-, corporate- and IT/IP law practice, commercial operations, contract negotiations, e-business, sales, networking, strategic consultancy.

education.field_of_study: Master in Company Law (Ondernemingsrecht aan de Zuidas)
Bachelor in Policy Communication & Organization (Beleid, Communicatie & Organisatie)

education.degree_name: Officier van Dienst Geneeskundig (via Het Netwerkcentrum & METS Center)

profile_positions.description:
CLEVR is a technology solutions company that helps clients deploy software strategically to create value. To do so, CLEVR leans on decades of experience and combines expertise in both standard product lifecycle management (PLM) and low-code software solutions.

With main hubs in the Netherlands, Norway, and Germany, CLEVR’s growing team of 250+ people provide solutions, services, tooling, and training to over 400 customers, including Continental, ING, Siemens, Rituals, and Eneco. CLEVR is a platinum-level Siemens solutions partner and a leading Mendix partner.​
profile_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer

profile_positions.description: During service weeks on-call (“piketdienst”) to provide 24/7 on-site/local command to medical teams at the place of a large(r) incident (>2 ambulances or as of GRIP 1), and to coordinate the relevant public and health authorities involved.
profile_positions.title: Officier van Dienst Geneeskundig (Medical Duty Officer)

profile_positions.description:
Investor and start-up/scale-up mentor for entrepreneurs. 

Rockstart launched in 2011 in Amsterdam as one of Europe’s first startup accelerators. Rockstart is a domain-focused accelerator-VC with follow-on growth funding that supports and empowers the best startups on their way to success across four domains: Energy, Health, AgriFood, and Emerging technologies. We provide startups with access to the capital, market, community, and expertise by connecting them to partners, investors, mentors and the wider Rockstart network.
profile_positions.title: Investor

profile_positions.description:
We harmonize product, nature and life for a more sustainable world.

In life, there are no rehearsals. Thanks to our 3DEXPERIENCE virtual universes, we can model, simulate and evaluate impacts before creating any experience in the real world.

As Vice President within DELMIA globally responsible for DELMIA Customer Process Experience (Indirect/Partner Sales Channel and Business Development), for defining and executing the Go To Market strategy, business development and sales for the DELMIA Midsize-Market offerings (targeting 100M-1B EUR / yr revenue companies), and for DELMIA Hosted Solutions.

DELMIA's portfolio includes Apriso, Ortems, Quintiq, 3DEXPERIENCE Digital Twin, 3DLean, MyHealth@Work, and has over 1 million users.
profile_positions.title: Vice President, DELMIA

profile_positions.description: NL Site Manager, directeur (authorized representative) and Board Member of Dassault Systèmes BV in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Managing Director and Board Member Dassault Systèmes BV

profile_positions.description:
P&L responsible leader of the global DELMIA Quintiq organization (850 FTE, 150M+ EUR/yr revenue, both software and services). Responsible for integrating the Quintiq organization into Dassault Systèmes, in close collaboration with a large group of senior stakeholders, including employee representation, Dassault Systèmes Group XCOM, HR, Quintiq Leaders, Brand Management, GEO Leadership, works councils. 

Integration successfully completed in January 2021 (one year ahead of schedule).
profile_positions.title: General Manager/CEO DELMIA Quintiq

profile_positions.description:
Senior Director, General Counsel, next to performing the role of Chief Commercial Operations Officer within the Executive Board of the Quintiq Brand (as of 2018).

As the General Counsel heading Quintiq's global legal team. Leading contract negotiations worldwide (€1M+ license/software services sales), handling legal affairs, managing Quintiq's in-house counsels and external lawyers. Coordinating and collaborating with Quintiq and Dassault Systèmes' senior leadership to facilitate large combined software deals.

Within Dassault Systèmes ("3DS"), lead of the Center of Competence "Return on Experience" ("REX"). The purpose of the 3DS Center of Competence REX is to address how 3DS Legal can ensure and implement ways to leverage its real life experiences, risks and values from one Region or Brand to the next. Such experiences can be processes, guidelines, cases, contractual terms, management situations, communication, and more.

About Dassault Systèmes: Dassault Systèmes (abbreviated 3DS), "The 3DEXPERIENCE Company", is an international listed French multinational software company that develops 3D design, 3D digital mock-up, and product lifecycle management (PLM) software. Dassault Systèmes markets 13 independent software brands, including Quintiq.
profile_positions.title: Senior Director, General Counsel Quintiq

profile_positions.description:
Chief Commercial Operations Officer (CCO) & General Counsel

Member of the Quintiq Board / Quintiq Executive Committee consisting of CEO, CTO, CFO and CCO. Responsibilities: Legal, Commercial Operations, Sales Operations, Alliances, and Strategic Pursuits. 

About Quintiq: Every business has its planning puzzles, some large, some complex, some seemingly impossible to solve. Quintiq’s vision is to solve every one using a single platform. That vision has driven the development of Quintiq software since the first line was coded back in 1997. Since then Quintiq has grown from a group of five programmers in a small office in 's-Hertogenbosch, the Netherlands, to a company with close to 1,000 employees in 25+ offices around the world. Our vision is transforming the world’s supply chains. Quintiq has been profitable every year since 1997, and is now known as an industry leader in supply chain planning & optimization. Today, approximately 12,000 users in numerous global organizations in over 80 countries use Quintiq on a daily basis. 

Quintiq is part of the Dassault Group (Dassault Systèmes) since 2014.
profile_positions.title: Chief Commercial Operations Officer & General Counsel

profile_positions.description:
Senior Director, General Counsel, Global Head of the Quintiq Legal Team within Dassault Systèmes.

Head of Quintiq's global legal team. Leading contract negotiations worldwide (€1M+ license/software services sales), handling legal affairs, managing Quintiq's in-house counsels and external lawyers. Coordinating and collaborating with Quintiq and Dassault Systèmes' senior leadership to facilitate large combined software deals.

Within Dassault Systèmes ("3DS"), lead of the Center of Competence "Return on Experience" ("REX"). The purpose of the 3DS Center of Competence REX is to address how 3DS Legal can ensure and implement ways to leverage its real life experiences, risks and values from one Region or Brand to the next. Such experiences can be processes, guidelines, cases, contractual terms, management situations, communication, and more.

About Dassault Systèmes: Dassault Systèmes (abbreviated 3DS), "The 3DEXPERIENCE Company", is an international listed French multinational software company that develops 3D design, 3D digital mock-up, and product lifecycle management (PLM) software. Dassault Systèmes markets 13 independent software brands, including Quintiq.
profile_positions.title: Senior Director, General Counsel

profile_positions.description: Director Quintiq Legal Department. Leading EMEA/APAC contract negotiations, handling legal affairs, and managing Quintiq's legal counsels. Direct report to the General Counsel (Global Head of Legal) based in the US.
profile_positions.title: Director, Legal

profile_positions.description: Team lead Quintiq Legal Department. Mainly involved in and responsible for Quintiq's contract negotiations in the EMEA (Europe, Middle East, Africa) and APAC (Asia Pacific) areas. Additionally, solving various internal issues with respect to employment law / corporate law / IP law, and coordinating external counseling in case of litigation.
profile_positions.title: Managing Counsel EMEA & APAC

profile_positions.description: Revising/negotiating external company and license contracts being involved in contract negotiations worldwide. Additionally, coordinating Quintiq's legal proceedings and solving internal legal issues in various areas.
profile_positions.title: Legal Counsel

profile_positions.description:
Founder, CEO and majority shareholder of Ficsus.nl. 

Ficsus.nl is a very popular cloud-based accountancy tool for self-employed professionals (in Dutch: "zzp'ers") in the Netherlands. Certified with the Zeker-Online Keurmerk, Ficsus.nl has close relationships with the Dutch Tax Authority in order to implement and market a "pre-filled" tax report for self-employed. 

Ficsus.nl's services can be found on www.ficsus.nl, www.ficsbook.nl and on the websites of large business partners like Telegraaf, Sprout, Financieele Dagblad, and auditing companies.

Ficsus.nl was chosen multiple times as the best online administration software for self employed.

Ficsus.nl was acquired in January 2019 by e-Boekhouden.nl (market leader Dutch online accountancy).
profile_positions.title: Founder & CEO

profile_positions.description: Writing articles in newspaper De Telegraaf on a regular base, reporting or commenting upon entrepreneurship and tax issues for self employed professionals.
profile_positions.title: Columnist

profile_positions.description:
Owner JR Strategic BV. Legal Counsel on-secondment / interim base.

Expertise: management consulting, corporate restructuring, corporate law, civil law.
profile_positions.title: Legal- and strategic management consultant

profile_positions.description:
Strategic and legal consultant in a project management team in order to restructure the TNO business unit Quality of Life into TNO Triskelion BV (private limited company, 200 employees). Responsible for the legal- (corporate and civil law) and ICT- issues.

Detached via JR Strategic BV / HH-im BV.
profile_positions.title: Legal- and strategic consultant (on secondment)

profile_positions.description:
Public policy consultant at Brandweer Amsterdam-Amstelland (department Preparation Crisis- and Disaster Management), involving activities (designing plans) on water management and information management. 

Responsible for Emergency Response Plan Dijkring 14 (Calamiteitenplan Dijkring 14) and Emergency Response Plan Amsterdam-Rijnkanaal (Rampbestrijdingsplan Amsterdam-Rijnkanaal).
profile_positions.title: Advisor VC&I
